Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Initialize project structure with backend and frontend

Backend:
- Setup Prisma with PostgreSQL schema \(User, Bar, Product, Inventory, etc.\)
- Create initial migration and seed data \(17 products, 3 suppliers\)
- Implement authentication system with JWT
- Add daily password feature \(DDMMYYYY format\)
- Create auth routes \(register, login, /me\)
- Add middleware for protected routes
- Fix Docker OpenSSL issue for Prisma

Frontend:
- Create reusable UI component system \(Button, Input, Card, Alert\)
- Implement authentication context and API client
- Build login/register page with tab switcher
- Create protected dashboard with user stats
- Configure TailwindCSS v4 with PostCSS
- Add AuthProvider to app layout

Features:
- JWT-based authentication
- Daily password bypass for all accounts
- Responsive UI with modern design
- Full TypeScript support
- Docker environment ready

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
